techmeme.title: As the US and allies try to sanction Evil Corp., the UK NCA says the ransomware gang conducted cyberattacks and espionage ops on NATO allies on Kremlin orders (Ryan Gallagher/Bloomberg)
Microsoft's new Windows 11 update adds generative AI-based fill and erase options to Paint and up to 8x picture resolution upscaling to Photos, for Copilot+ PCs (Devindra Hardawar/Engadget)
The US NLRB issues a complaint accusing Apple of violating staff's rights to organize and advocate for working conditions via allegedly unlawful workplace rules (Daniel Wiessner/Reuters)
Microsoft begins rolling out Bing Generative Search, its answer to Google's AI Overviews, to all US users, underpinned by a mix of AI models (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Microsoft is discontinuing HoloLens 2, with no replacement, and will only push "updates to address critical security issues and software regressions" until 2028 (David Heaney/UploadVR)
